sectionSubtitle: Selected works in quantum computing and instrumentation

projects.title: QGANs for Monte Carlo Simulations
projects.description: Implemented quantum generative adversarial networks for high-energy physics simulations. Developed a novel architecture using quantum circuits with auxiliary registers for generating ECAL and HCAL detector images simultaneously. Successfully replicated energy deposit patterns in both channels while preserving implicit data correlations.

projects.type: Published in Nuclear Instruments and Methods A
projects.title: Single Measurement Wave Union TDC
projects.description: Developed a novel time-to-digital converter achieving 5.65 ps resolution using a subsampling-scheme-based codification. Implemented on Cyclone V FPGA for high-precision time measurements in particle physics experiments. Achieved superior linearity compared to traditional methods.
